pt.pedrorijo91.utils.collections

Class CountableMap<K>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
      • java.util.HashMap<K,java.lang.Integer>
        • pt.pedrorijo91.utils.collections.CountableMap<K>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<K,java.lang.Integer>

    public class CountableMap<K>
extends java.util.HashMap<K,java.lang.Integer>
    Simple Hashmap implementation that provides an abstraction level for counting elements.
    Author:
    pedrorijo
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
